title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for users to remove themselves from an enterprise account, including prerequisites and steps.
Updated unaffiliated user permissions: can now self-remove from enterprises (except EMU users) and receive Copilot licenses.
Clarified Copilot license management: enterprise owners retain assignment rights when disabling org-level access, avoiding double-billing.
Improved replication setup: `ghe-repl-start` no longer requires maintenance window when executed immediately after `ghe-repl-setup` and `ghe-config-apply`.
summary:
- Added documentation for users to remove themselves from an enterprise account, including prerequisites and steps.
- Updated unaffiliated user permissions: can now self-remove from enterprises (except EMU users) and receive Copilot licenses.
- Clarified Copilot license management: enterprise owners retain assignment rights when disabling org-level access, avoiding double-billing.
- Improved replication setup: `ghe-repl-start` no longer requires maintenance window when executed immediately after `ghe-repl-setup` and `ghe-config-apply`.
generated_title: Enable enterprise self-removal, clarify Copilot settings, and optimize replication setup
commits: **3d9e2f9**: Clarify org and enterprise Copilot settings (#58923) (by Isaac Brown)
**c00a494**: Unaffiliated users can self-remove from an enterprise (#58575) (by Isaac Brown)
**f932a7c**: Reducing downtime on starting replication (#58931) (by Pallavi)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for users to remove themselves from an enterprise account, including prerequisites and steps.
- Updated unaffiliated user permissions: can now self-remove from enterprises (except EMU users) and receive Copilot licenses.
- Clarified Copilot license management: enterprise owners retain assignment rights when disabling org-level access, avoiding double-billing.
- Improved replication setup: `ghe-repl-start` no longer requires maintenance window when executed immediately after `ghe-repl-setup` and `ghe-config-apply`.

### Title
Enable enterprise self-removal, clarify Copilot settings, and optimize replication setup
